entry.title: Customer Return(A2X) API and In-House Repair API Combination of any another API is available?
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Good Day!

Is there any API available that combines Customer Return API and In-House Repair?

Overview | Customer Return (A2X) | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

Try Out | In-House Repair | SAP Business Accelerator Hub 

I have checked the APIs and found no relationship between the two. Could you please provide details of a combination API, any relationship information, or release CDS views.

Regards,

Srini.

entry.title: Help on RA Costs on GR55
entry.content:
I want a column in GR55 that shows RA cost

For example, looking at V.006010 the RA costs is 572,601.05, but on GR55
there is no cost recorded (See both screenshots attached). Where does
the value come from on CJE0 and why is it not coming through on GR55?

entry.title: Posting type 4 or 5 in electronic bank statement - bank clearing account to be searched
entry.content:
Is it possible with posting type 4 or 5 to include an account symbol so that it is taken into account into FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON? 

In the most cases we need to have FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON in posting area 2 to be equal to the bank clearing account from posting area 1, but then FEBEP-AVKON/FEBCL-AGKON is empty unless we define search strings to define the account nr for every company code/house bank/account id combination

entry.title: S/4HANA‚ÄìDoes Leading Ledger 0L Require the Same Fiscal Year and Posting Period Variant for All CoCo?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

I am facing an issue related to the Leading Ledger 0L in SAP S/4HANA, and I would like to clarify the correct concept.

Background:
In ECC, I worked with ledger 0L, where multiple company codes were assigned, and each company code had:

  • Different Fiscal Year Variants (FYV)

  • Different Posting Period Variants (PPV)

This worked without any issue in ECC.

Current Issue in S/4HANA:
In S/4HANA, when I try to maintain or open T-code: FINSC_LEDGER, I get an error related to data inconsistency. I have shared screenshots below.

 

While searching online, I found multiple references stating that:

All company codes assigned to leading ledger 0L must have the same Fiscal Year Variant and Posting Period Variant.

This is confusing to me because it was possible in ECC to have different FYV and PPV under the same leading ledger.

My Questions:

1.   In S/4HANA, is it mandatory that all company codes assigned to the leading ledger 0L must have the same:

  • Fiscal Year Variant?

  • Posting Period Variant?

2.   If yes, why was this restriction introduced in S/4HANA, and how does it technically impact:

  • Universal Journal (ACDOCA)?

  • Cross-company reporting?

3.   How can this error in FINSC_LEDGER be resolved correctly without causing inconsistencies?

I would really appreciate an explanation comparing ECC vs S/4HANA behavior, and best practices for ledger and company code design in S/4HANA.

Thank you in advance for your guidance.

Regards,
Suba

entry.title: How to create sales area through migration cockpit when we only filled company code only
entry.content:
Hi All,

I want to ask something about customer master through migration cockpit in SAP Public Cloud

First, i already make a customer master through migration cockpit and i only filled company data without filled sales area data.

is there any option to create the sales area data when we only filled the company data in the template before ?

i already try about Customer - extend existing record by new org levels but in only accept if i extend into new company code, when i want to create sales area through it, it will read the customer doesn't exist as a supplier.

if you have any similar solving like my problem in sap public cloud, i will need your help.

 

thankyou

entry.title: customer hierarchy derivation error
entry.content:
Dear all,

I create a derivation rule for custmer hierarchy, lookup from table KNVH;

While executing this table lookup, the system could not find an entry for the specified source values in table KNVH. Derivation was not carried out. Reason: No value found.

But I've maintained the customer hierarchy in VDH1N and I can see the data in KNVH.

could someone help me.

Thanks.

Best regards.

Mary

entry.title: Billing plan details capturing issue against the contract item in SAP ECC
entry.content:
Hello All,

We have been facing an issue while processing the milestone billing against the contract item even we follow sequential process.

Config: 

1. we have enabled the billing plan at item category level and did the remain functional setup

Development the program with the below standard BAPIs/FMs

1. BAPI_CONTRACT_CREATEFROMDATA

2. BILLING_SCHEDULE_GENERATE

3.BILLING_SCHEDULE_GET_NUMBER

4.BILLING_SCHEDULE_SAVE  - Here we are trying to insert the billing plan details 

5.SD_SALES_DOCUMENT_SAVE

6.BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT

Outcome: The billing plan details aren't storing in the DB and can't be seen in VBKD,FPLA & FPLT etc.,

Note: We would appreciate any suggestions or inputs from your end.

entry.title: Block Pricing Condition Input in VA02
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a requirement to block condition input in tax jurisdiction conditions when changing a sales order.

As far as I know, I need to maintain this configuration as ‚ÄúManual entry has priority‚Äù for jurisdiction conditions.

 

Tax rates are coming from FTXP (FI), but users should not be able to change these rates.

I found some includes, but I am not sure how to use them. If you know anything about this, please let me know : 

LV69AFZZ
LV69AF01 - FORM tctrl_konditionen_init .


Kind regards,

Nedim Yilmaz

entry.title: License Inquiry and Clarification on CPU Metrics for SAP Business Objects
entry.content:
Hi all,

Could you provide me the solution for the following queries:

1) In our Production BO  environment, our current License shows a CPU metric of 4 at the CMC level, while the Windows OS reports 8 virtual processors. Could you please confirm whether the CPU metric at CMC refers to Physical CPUs or Virtual CPUs at the Windows level? Could you please provide clarity on this discrepancy?

2) If we plan to add additional vCPUs at the operating system level, will this require an additional license to be applied in the CMC?

3) If an additional license is required, can the existing license be reused for the added vCPUs, or must a new license key be imported?

NOTE: Out BO version is SAP BusinessObjects BI Platform 4.2 Support Pack 9 Patch 21 (Version: 14.2.9.5104) 

Regards,
Srikanth.

entry.title: About VSIT in scope item 5MQ
entry.content:
Dear sap experter.

I have active scope item 5MQ, and setting as below

sales org: 1310

plant: 1310

item category: tan

incoterms: DAP

Relevant for SFS VSiT Process

when I create sales order by 1310/1310/tan/dap,

the movement type still is 601 in delivery notes.

This means that it did not use the VSIT function.

entry.title: SAP ERP HR/Time/Benefits/Payroll Data Archiving to S/4HANA ‚Äì Best Practices and Strategy
entry.content:
Hello,

I am seeking insights on best practices and lessons learned regarding the archiving of SAP ERP HR, Benefits, Time, and Payroll data to S/4HANA.

We have approximately 20,000 active employees and over 35,000 total employees, with payroll and time results spanning different periods. We also process retroactive payroll for multiple years due to late settlements of collective agreements.

I have the following questions:

  • Are there any specific data preparation steps required before archiving payroll/time data?
  • What are the recommended best practices?
  • Lessons learned.
  • Any additional information we should be aware of.

Any guidance or information you can share would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Ramakrishnan. V

entry.title: Duplicate records for specific dates in SAP Analytics Cloud import model
entry.content:
Source Connection: SAP ERP

Recently, I noticed that for two specific days in November 2025, the values are exactly doubled. This issue occurs only for few dates, and all other dates are correct.

POV:

Import mode: Update

Data in the source SAP ERP is correct (no duplicates)

The job has been running fine before and after these dates

No changes were made to the model or job around that time

My questions:

How is it possible to get duplicates in Update mode?

What could be the reason for duplication only on specific days?

How can I fix this issue and prevent it in the future?

Any guidance would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in Advance!

Any guidance or best practice would be appreciated.

entry.title: Mass Upload of Statistical Commodity Codes in SAP S/4HANA ‚Äì Is There a Standard Solution?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

we would like to upload commodity codes into our SAP system in bulk, instead of maintaining them manually via the app ‚ÄúManage Commodity Codes‚Äù.

During my research, I came across the App "Mass Upload Utility" (App ID F4383): https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F4383')/S18OP

However, this app cannot be found in any of our systems. According to a blog post, it seems that the app might only be available or relevant for certain countries, such as Saudi Arabia. This leads to the following questions:

Is there any standard SAP way to mass upload statistical commodity codes in SAP S/4HANA?

If the Mass Upload Utility (F4383) is required for this purpose, how can it be used or activated in Germany?

Are there alternative approaches (e.g. migration objects, APIs, or other Fiori apps) to maintain statistical commodity codes in bulk?

The question primarily refers to SAP S/4HANA Private Edition, but insights regarding the Public Edition would also be appreciated. Thank you very much in advance. Best regards

 

Edit: I would like to upload a single file with commodity codes and their description. If possible I would like to stay away from data providers

entry.title: Asset Reporting in Test System
entry.content:
Hi there, 

I have a request from a business user to make a change to a standard Asset Report (S_ALR_87011964).

However, when I go to run this report in our test system, I get the following message. 

"Fiscal year change not yet made for company code 1140. Message no. AB059"

Then when I go to transaction AJRW, I get the following message "NOTE: The fiscal year change is only a technical step, needed in order to carry forward all assets into the new fiscal year. The fiscal year change has nothing to do with the YEAR-END CLOSING for bookkeeping. In order to close the annual values in Asset Accounting for a given fiscal year, you are required to carry out YEAR-END CLOSING in Asset Accounting BEFORE the year-end closing for
the general ledger. "

So my question is - is there any short-cut/work-around that can be done to mimic/bypass year end closing in our Test environments? This has not been processed in any of our test system since go-live (10 years ago) so would involve a lot of work now just so that we can test an Asset report.

Thanks,

Avril

entry.title: Input Journal Entry on Reporting Item (F.05 FB50)
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

The users register line items in transaction F.50 because they use their own calculated exchange rates.
The users do not use the document currency in SAP.
When there is a large volume of data, entering each line item manually takes a significant amount of time.
Could you advise if there is a transaction code that allows multiple inputs and also provides functionality similar to F.50 and FB50, where the user can manually adjust foreign currency amounts?

Thank you in advance
